description: Before the great stone barracks built alongside the keep, sunlight pours in from over the high, bastioned curtain wall of the ward, basking the open training yard in its glow.  Pells and training dummies are lined up along the wall, while nearby archery targets await their fate.  Rings line a long, oval course around the yard, its run broken by a few quintains.  Centered is a dais-raised practice ring, lined by low stone ashlars and racks of practice weapons.

Before the great stone barracks built alongside the keep, the night air eddies crisply within the bastioned curtain wall of the ward, cooling the training yard with a light breeze.  Pells and training dummies are lined up along the wall, while nearby archery targets await their fate.  Rings line a long, oval course around the yard, its run broken by a few quintains.  Centered is a dais-raised practice ring, lined by low stone ashlars and racks of practice weapons.
title: [Sunholm, The Drilling Yard]
